\Aura\SqlColumnFactory

A factory for column objects.

Methods

newInstance()

newInstance(string $name, string $type, int $size, int $scale, bool $notnull, mixed $default, bool $autoinc, bool $primary)

Returns a new Column object.

Parameters

string $name

The name of the column.
string $type

The datatype of the column.
int $size

The size of the column.
int $scale

The scale of the column (i.e., the number of digits after the decimal point).
bool $notnull

Is the column defined as NOT NULL (i.e., required) ?
mixed $default

The default value of the column.
bool $autoinc

Is the column auto-incremented?
bool $primary

Is the column part of the primary key?

None found
